definition: to bury the hatchet/to become reconciled
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

sentences.english: They have like a two second rebound rate and you're back doing the next pain-in-the-ass thing.
sentences.chinese: 不好兩秒鐘我們就和好如初然後我們接着再吵。

sentences.english: Hao 9 and peach kyi reconciliation, peach kyi win the lawsuit.
sentences.chinese: 浩九和桃姬和好如初，桃姬打贏了官司。

sentences.english: I left as depressed as I’ve ever been, knowing that reconciliation was impossible.
sentences.chinese: 離開父親時我很沮喪，我想，和好如初是不可能的了。

sentences.english: The breakdown of their marriage was irretrievable .
sentences.chinese: 他倆婚姻破裂，已無法和好如初。

sentences.english: He didn't do a runner. He was trying to make everything all right.
sentences.chinese: 他沒有想要逃避，他試着讓一切和好如初。

sentences.english: Little read this I rest assured, two people reconciliation.
sentences.chinese: 小念這才放心，倆人和好如初。

sentences.english: Sometimes we will fight but we always get along well.
sentences.chinese: 有時我們會爭吵，但我們總是會和好如初。

sentences.english: The two friends have at last made up after the slight misunderstanding.
sentences.chinese: 在這小小的誤會之後，兩個朋友已經和好如初。

sentences.english: They patched up their tiff again.
sentences.chinese: 他們平息了爭執，又和好如初了。

sentences.english: Can you turn around and reconnect?
sentences.chinese: 你能回頭並和好如初嗎？

sentences.english: They quarrelled but now they are completely reconciled.
sentences.chinese: 他們爭吵過，但現在已和好如初。

sentences.english: In the KaDing under repeated explanations, two into finally animosity, reconciliation. Mrs.
sentences.chinese: 在卡丁的再三解釋下，二入終於冰釋前嫌，和好如初。
